dashboard.title: Hi JonDon,
dashboard.subtitle: You can preview how your home appears to others, make updates, and get ready to welcome guests for a home exchange.

part1.subtitle1: Tell guests where your home is located so they can plan their stay with confidence.
part1.miniTitle2: Where would you like to go?
part1.subtitle2: Choose your destination and start planning your next adventure with Vacanza.

card1.subtitle1: Your home is an independent property.
card1.subtitle2: our home is in a building shared by several apartments.

card2.miniTitle1: Yes, I live there all year round
card2.subtitle1: Your home is an independent property.
card2.subtitle2: Your home is in a building shared by several apartments.

part4.subtitle1: Pick a name that reflects the personality or charm of your home — it’s the first thing guests will see!
part4.subtitle2: Tell guests what makes your home inviting — mention the style, atmosphere, and anything that makes it feel special.
part4.title3: Tell us about the area around your home
part4.subtitle3: Help guests get a feel for your location — share nearby attractions, dining spots, transport options, and the overall vibe of your neighborhood.
part4.subtitle4: Showcase your home from every angle by uploading at least 5 high-quality photos — include key spaces like the living area, kitchen, bedroom, and bathroom.
part4.fileSubtitle: Upload an image of your property (JPG or PNG format supported)
